entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world

text: The White House appears to be plowing forward with plans to end the nation's coronavirus lockdown, dropping hints about how and where it may ease up on the social distancing measures that have brought the U.S. economy to a standstill in recent weeks https://t.co/yClqNyrKO7
